H0.text: On which river is Shrewsbury. Thames

H1.text: On which river is Shrewsbury. Trent

H2.text: On which river is Shrewsbury. Avon

H3.text: On which river is Shrewsbury. Severn

A4.text: Shrewsbury is sited on the River Severn

A5.text: The River Severn flows through the town, forming a meander around its centre
